text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure provides flexibility between capital expenditure (CapEx) and operational expenditure (OpEx)
If you create two Azure virtual machines that use the B2S size, each virtual machine will always generate the same monthly costs
When an Azure virtual machine is stopped, you continue to pay storage costs associated to the virtual machine

explanation: Azure offers flexibility in payment models (CapEx vs OpEx). VM costs can vary based on region, usage patterns, and other factors even for same-sized VMs. Storage costs continue even when VMs are stopped (deallocated).

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: To implement a hybrid cloud model, a company must first have a private cloud
A company can extend the capacity of its internal network by using the public cloud
In a public cloud model, only guest users at your company can access the resources in the cloud

explanation: Hybrid cloud doesn't require an existing private cloud. Public cloud can extend internal network capacity. Public cloud resources can be accessed by authorized users (not just guests).

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: A platform as a service (PaaS) solution that hosts web apps in Azure provides full control of the operating systems that host applications
A platform as a service (PaaS) solution that hosts web apps in Azure provides the ability to scale the platform automatically
A platform as a service (PaaS) solution that hosts web apps in Azure provides professional development services to customize application deployments

explanation: PaaS doesn't provide OS-level access but does offer automatic scaling capabilities and professional development services for customization.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure resources can only access other resources in the same resource group
If you delete a resource group, all the resources in the resource group will be deleted
A resource group can contain resources from multiple Azure regions

explanation: Resources can access other resources across resource groups. Deleting a resource group deletes all its resources. Resource groups can contain resources from multiple regions.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

When you are implementing a software as a service (SaaS) solution, you are responsible for configuring high availability.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: When using SaaS, you are responsible for configuring the SaaS solution to meet your requirements. The SaaS provider manages high availability, infrastructure, and platform. You configure settings, users, and features.

text:
You have an on-premises network that contains several servers.

You plan to migrate all the servers to Azure.

You need to recommend a solution to ensure that some of the servers are available if a single Azure data center goes offline for an extended period.

What should you include in the recommendation?
explanation: Fault tolerance is the ability of a system to continue to function in the event of a failure of some of its components. Availability zones expand the level of control you have to maintain the availability of applications and data on your VMs. By architecting solutions to use replicated VMs in zones, you can protect applications and data from the loss of a datacenter.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

An organization that hosts its infrastructure in a private cloud can decommission its data center.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: A private cloud is hosted in your datacenter. Therefore, you cannot close your datacenter if you are using a private cloud. A public cloud is hosted externally, for example, in Microsoft Azure. An organization that hosts its infrastructure in a public cloud can close its data center.

text: What are two characteristics of the public cloud? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.
explanation: With the public cloud, you get pay-as-you-go pricing (metered pricing). With the public cloud, you have self-service management. You are responsible for the deployment and configuration of cloud resources. The underlying hardware is managed by the cloud provider.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

When planning to migrate a public website to Azure, you must plan to pay monthly usage costs.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: C
options.text: pay to transfer all the website data to Azure

options.label: D
options.text: reduce the number of connections to the website

explanation: When planning to migrate a public website to Azure, you must plan to pay monthly usage costs. This is because Azure uses the pay-as-you-go model.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.

After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.

An Azure administrator plans to run a PowerShell script that creates Azure resources.

You need to recommend which computer configuration to use to run the script.

Solution: Run the script from a computer that runs Linux and has the Azure CLI tools installed.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: A PowerShell script needs PowerShell to run. Azure CLI is a different command-line tool. While Azure CLI can be used on Linux, it cannot run PowerShell scripts directly.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.

After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.

An Azure administrator plans to run a PowerShell script that creates Azure resources.

You need to recommend which computer configuration to use to run the script.

Solution: Run the script from a computer that runs Chrome OS and uses Azure Cloud Shell.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: Azure Cloud Shell is a browser-based shell experience that supports both PowerShell and Bash. It can be accessed from any device with a web browser, including Chrome OS.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.

After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.

An Azure administrator plans to run a PowerShell script that creates Azure resources.

You need to recommend which computer configuration to use to run the script.

Solution: Run the script from a computer that runs macOS and has PowerShell Core 6.0 installed.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: PowerShell Core is cross-platform and runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux. PowerShell Core 6.0 on macOS can run PowerShell scripts including those that create Azure resources.

text:
You have an Azure environment that contains 10 virtual networks and 100 virtual machines.

You need to limit the amount of inbound traffic to all the Azure virtual networks.

What should you create?
explanation: Azure Firewall is a managed, cloud-based network security service that can protect resources in multiple virtual networks. You can restrict traffic to multiple virtual networks with a single Azure firewall.

text:
You need to view a list of planned maintenance events that can affect the availability of an Azure subscription.

Which blade should you use from the Azure portal? To answer, select the appropriate blade in the answer area.

statements.text: Use the 'Service Health' blade to view planned maintenance events

explanation: Azure Service Health provides personalized alerts and guidance when Azure service issues affect you. It can notify you about planned maintenance that can affect your resources.

text:
Match the Azure service to the correct definition.

Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate Azure service from the column on the left to its description on the right. Each service may be used once, more than once, or not at all.
note: Each correct match is worth one point.
rightItems: Provides recommendations on high availability, security, performance, and cost
Provides AI and machine learning services
Monitors and diagnoses web application issues
Provides tools for software development collaboration

matches.Azure Advisor: Provides recommendations on high availability, security, performance, and cost
matches.Azure Cognitive Services: Provides AI and machine learning services
matches.Azure Application Insights: Monitors and diagnoses web application issues
matches.Azure DevOps: Provides tools for software development collaboration

explanation: Azure Advisor provides personalized recommendations. Azure Cognitive Services includes AI/ML APIs. Application Insights is for application performance monitoring. Azure DevOps provides development collaboration tools.

text:
You plan to map a network drive from several computers that run Windows 10 to Azure Storage.

You need to create a storage solution in Azure for the planned mapped drive.

What should you create?

options.label: C
options.text: a Files service in a storage account

options.label: D
options.text: a Blobs service in a storage account

explanation: Azure Files is Microsoft's easy-to-use cloud file system. Azure file shares can be seamlessly used in Windows. To use an Azure file share with Windows, you must either mount it (assign a drive letter or mount point path) or access it via its UNC path.

text:
You plan to implement an Azure database solution.

You need to implement a database solution that meets the following requirements:
• Can add data concurrently from multiple regions
• Can store JSON documents

Which database service should you deploy? To answer, select the appropriate service in the answer area.

statements.text: Azure Cosmos DB supports multi-region writes and JSON document storage

explanation: Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, multi-model database service that supports JSON documents and allows concurrent writes from multiple regions.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure Firewall can encrypt network traffic sent to Azure
A Network Security Group (NSG) can encrypt network traffic sent to Azure
Azure VPN Gateway can encrypt network traffic sent to Azure

explanation: Azure Firewall and NSGs are used for filtering traffic, not encryption. Azure VPN Gateway encrypts traffic between on-premises networks and Azure using IPSec.

text:
Your company plans to deploy an Artificial Intelligence (AI) solution in Azure.

What should the company use to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics solutions?
explanation: Azure Machine Learning designer provides a visual interface to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics solutions using machine learning models.

text:
Several support engineers plan to manage Azure by using the computers shown in the following table:

Computer 1: Windows 10
Computer 2: Ubuntu
Computer 3: MacOS Mojave

You need to identify which Azure management tools can be used from each computer.

What should you identify for each computer? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Computer 1 (Windows 10) can use: Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, Azure CLI
Computer 2 (Ubuntu) can use: Azure Portal, Azure CLI
Computer 3 (MacOS) can use: Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, Azure CLI

explanation: Azure Portal is browser-based and works on all platforms. PowerShell Core is cross-platform. Azure CLI is also cross-platform and works on Windows, Linux, and macOS.

text:
Several support engineers plan to manage Azure by using the computers shown in the following table.

You need to identify which Azure management tools can be used from each computer.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: The Azure CLI can be installed on Windows, Linux, and macOS
Azure PowerShell can be installed on Windows, Linux, and macOS
Azure Cloud Shell can be accessed from any device with a web browser

explanation: Azure CLI and PowerShell Core are cross-platform tools. Azure Cloud Shell is browser-based and accessible from any device with internet connectivity.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the Bold text to determine if it is correct.

Azure policies provide a common platform for deploying objects to a cloud infrastructure and for implementing consistency across the Azure environment.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: Azure Resource Manager provides a common platform for deploying objects to cloud infrastructure and implementing consistency. Azure policies are used to enforce rules and compliance, not for deployment.

text:
Match the Azure service to the correct description.

Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate Azure service from the column on the left to its description on the right. Each service may be used once, more than once, or not at all.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.
explanation: Azure Functions is serverless. App Service hosts web apps. Virtual Machines provide IaaS. Container Instances run containers without managing infrastructure.

text:
Your company has several business units.

Each business unit requires 20 different Azure resources for daily operation. All the business units require the same type of Azure resources.

You need to recommend a solution to automate the creation of the Azure resources.

What should you include in the recommendations?
explanation: Azure Resource Manager templates allow you to automate the creation of Azure resources. Templates use declarative syntax to define infrastructure and configuration, enabling consistent and repeatable deployments.

text:
Match the Azure service to the correct definition.

Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate Azure service from the column on the left to its description on the right. Each service may be used once, more than once, or not at all.
note: Each correct match is worth one point.
rightItems: Provides big data analysis for machine learning
Detects and diagnoses anomalies in web apps

matches.Azure Databricks: Provides big data analysis for machine learning
matches.Azure Application Insights: Detects and diagnoses anomalies in web apps

explanation: Azure Functions is serverless compute. Databricks is an Apache Spark-based analytics platform for ML. Application Insights monitors app performance. App Service hosts web apps.

text:
You plan to deploy a critical line-of-business application to Azure.

The application will run on an Azure virtual machine.

You need to recommend a deployment solution for the application. The solution must provide a guaranteed availability of 99.99 percent.

What is the minimum number of virtual machines and the minimum number of availability zones you should recommend for the deployment? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Minimum number of virtual machines: 2
Minimum number of availability zones: 2

explanation: To achieve 99.99% SLA, you need at least two VMs deployed across two or more availability zones. Each zone is a separate physical location with independent power, cooling, and networking.

text: Which Azure service should you use to correlate events from multiple resources into a centralized repository?
explanation: Azure Event Hubs is a big data streaming platform and event ingestion service. It can receive and process millions of events per second, making it ideal for correlating events from multiple resources.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your Azure environment contains multiple Azure virtual machines.

You need to ensure that a virtual machine named VM1 is accessible from the Internet over HTTP.

Solution: You modify a DDoS protection plan.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: A DDoS protection plan protects against distributed denial-of-service attacks but doesn't control inbound access. To allow HTTP access, you need to configure network security rules or firewall rules.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your Azure environment contains multiple Azure virtual machines.

You need to ensure that a virtual machine named VM1 is accessible from the Internet over HTTP.

Solution: You modify an Azure firewall.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: Azure Firewall can be configured with NAT rules to allow inbound HTTP traffic from the Internet to reach VM1. This meets the goal of making VM1 accessible over HTTP.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your Azure environment contains multiple Azure virtual machines.

You need to ensure that a virtual machine named VM1 is accessible from the Internet over HTTP.

Solution: You modify an Azure Traffic Manager profile.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: Azure Traffic Manager is a DNS-based traffic load balancer. It doesn't control network access or firewall rules. To allow HTTP access to a VM, you need to configure network security groups or Azure Firewall.

text: Which two types of customers are eligible to use Azure Government to develop a cloud solution? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.
explanation: Azure Government is available to US government entities and their contractors. It provides a dedicated cloud environment for US government agencies and their partners, meeting specific compliance requirements.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure resources inherit tags from their resource group
Azure resources can have multiple tags
A resource group can have multiple Azure resources from different Azure regions

explanation: Tags are not inherited by default. Resources can have multiple tags for organization. A resource group can contain resources from any Azure region.

text:
You need to ensure that when Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) users connect to Azure AD from the Internet by using an anonymous IP address, the users are prompted automatically to change their password.

Which Azure service should you use?
explanation: Azure AD Identity Protection includes risk policies that can detect anonymous IP address sign-ins and automatically require password changes based on risk level.

text:
Match the term to the correct definition.

Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate term from the column on the left to its description on the right. Each term may be used once, more than once, or not at all.
note: Each correct match is worth one point.
rightItems: The ability to increase computing capacity
The ability to recover from failures
The ability to continue operating despite failures
The ability to automatically adjust resources

matches.Scalability: The ability to increase computing capacity
matches.Disaster Recovery: The ability to recover from failures
matches.Fault Tolerance: The ability to continue operating despite failures
matches.Elasticity: The ability to automatically adjust resources

explanation: Scalability is about capacity growth. Disaster recovery is about restoration after failure. Fault tolerance maintains operation during failures. Elasticity automatically scales resources up or down.

text:
Your company plans to deploy several web servers and several database servers to Azure.

You need to recommend an Azure solution to limit the types of connections from the web servers to the database servers.

What should you include in the recommendation?
explanation: Network security groups (NSGs) contain security rules that allow or deny inbound and outbound network traffic. You can use NSGs to limit connections between web servers and database servers based on ports, protocols, and source/destination.

text: To what should an application connect to retrieve security tokens?
explanation: Applications connect to Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) to retrieve security tokens for authentication and authorization. Azure AD is the identity provider that issues tokens.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

Resource groups provide organizations with the ability to manage the compliance of Azure resources across multiple subscriptions.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: Azure policies are used to manage compliance of Azure resources across multiple subscriptions. Resource groups are logical containers within a subscription and don't span multiple subscriptions.

text:
Your network contains an Active Directory forest. The forest contains 5,000 user accounts.

Your company plans to migrate all network resources to Azure and to decommission the on-premises data center.

You need to recommend a solution to minimize the impact on users after the planned migration.

What should you recommend?

options.label: B
options.text: Sync all the Active Directory user accounts to Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)

options.label: C
options.text: Instruct all users to change their password

options.label: D
options.text: Create a guest user account in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) for each user

explanation: To minimize impact on users, you should sync all Active Directory user accounts to Azure AD using Azure AD Connect. This preserves user identities and can even sync passwords, allowing users to continue using their existing credentials.

text:
You create a resource group named RG1 in Azure Resource Manager.

You need to prevent the accidental deletion of the resources in RG1.

Which setting should you use? To answer, select the appropriate setting in the answer area.

statements.text: Use the 'Locks' setting to prevent deletion of resources

explanation: You can configure a lock on a resource group to prevent accidental deletion. A CanNotDelete lock prevents authorized users from deleting resources, though they can still read and modify them.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company plans to purchase Azure.

The company's support policy states that the Azure environment must provide an option to access support engineers by phone or email.

You need to recommend which support plan meets the support policy requirement.

Solution: Recommend a Basic support plan.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: The Basic support plan does not provide access to support engineers by phone or email. Basic only provides billing and subscription support. You need at least a Standard support plan for technical support.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company plans to purchase Azure.

The company's support policy states that the Azure environment must provide an option to access support engineers by phone or email.

You need to recommend which support plan meets the support policy requirement.

Solution: Recommend a Standard support plan.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: The Standard support plan provides technical support via email and phone during business hours. This meets the requirement for accessing support engineers by phone or email.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company plans to purchase Azure.

The company's support policy states that the Azure environment must provide an option to access support engineers by phone or email.

You need to recommend which support plan meets the support policy requirement.

Solution: Recommend a Premier support plan.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: The Premier support plan provides comprehensive support including technical support via email and phone 24/7. This meets the requirement.

text:
Your company plans to request an architectural review of an Azure environment from Microsoft.

The company currently has a Basic support plan.

You need to recommend a new support plan for the company. The solution must minimize costs.

Which support plan should you recommend?
explanation: The Premier support plan provides customer-specific architectural support such as design reviews, performance tuning, and configuration assistance. While it's the most expensive, it's the only plan that provides architectural reviews.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: An Azure free account can be used to deploy multiple Azure SQL databases
An Azure free account has a spending limit
An Azure free account can only be used for 30 days

explanation: Azure free accounts can deploy multiple resources including SQL databases. They have spending limits. The free account includes 12 months of popular free services plus always-free services, not just 30 days.

text: What is required to use Azure Cost Management?
explanation: Azure Cost Management is available to customers with an Azure Enterprise Agreement (EA), Microsoft Customer Agreement (MCA), or Microsoft Partner Agreement (MPA). It's not available for all subscription types.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

Your Azure trial account expired last week. You are now unable to create additional Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) user accounts.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: B
options.text: start an existing Azure virtual machine

options.label: C
options.text: access your data stored in Azure

explanation: When a trial expires, you cannot start VMs because that would incur charges. However, you can still create Azure AD user accounts, access data, and use the portal. Starting a VM requires an active paid subscription.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: All Azure services in private preview are available to all Azure customers
Azure services in public preview can be managed using the Azure portal
Azure services in public preview are subject to a Service Level Agreement (SLA)

explanation: Private previews are available only to selected customers. Public preview services can be managed through standard tools. Preview services are excluded from SLAs.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Availability zones are used to replicate data and applications to multiple regions
Only virtual machines that run Windows Server can be created in availability zones
Availability zones are used to protect against data center failures

explanation: Availability zones are within a single region (not across regions). They support both Windows and Linux VMs. They protect against datacenter failures by providing redundancy within a region.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: If you set permissions to a resource group, all the Azure resources in that resource group inherit the permissions
If you assign a tag to a resource group, all the Azure resources in that resource group are assigned the same tag
If you delete a resource group, all the Azure resources in that resource group will be deleted

explanation: Permissions are inherited from resource groups. Tags are not inherited automatically. Deleting a resource group deletes all contained resources.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

You have several virtual machines in an Azure subscription. You create a new subscription. The virtual machines cannot be moved to the new subscription.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: B
options.text: The virtual machines can be moved to the new subscription

options.label: C
options.text: The virtual machines can be moved to the new subscription only if they are all in the same resource group

options.label: D
options.text: The virtual machines can be moved to the new subscription only if they run Windows Server 2016

explanation: Virtual machines can be moved to a different subscription using the Azure portal. The VMs don't need to be in the same resource group or run a specific OS version.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company has an Azure subscription that contains the following unused resources:
• 20 user accounts in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)
• Five groups in Azure AD
• 10 public IP addresses
• 10 network interfaces

You need to reduce the Azure costs for the company.

Solution: You remove the unused user accounts.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: You are not charged for user accounts in Azure AD. Removing them will not reduce costs.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company has an Azure subscription that contains the following unused resources:
• 20 user accounts in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)
• Five groups in Azure AD
• 10 public IP addresses
• 10 network interfaces

You need to reduce the Azure costs for the company.

Solution: You remove the unused public IP addresses.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: Public IP addresses have associated costs. Removing unused public IP addresses will reduce Azure costs.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

Your company has an Azure subscription that contains the following unused resources:
• 20 user accounts in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)
• Five groups in Azure AD
• 10 public IP addresses
• 10 network interfaces

You need to reduce the Azure costs for the company.

Solution: You remove the unused groups.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: You are not charged for Azure Active Directory groups. Removing unused groups will not reduce Azure costs.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

You have an Azure environment.

You need to create a new Azure virtual machine from an Android laptop.

Solution: You use the Azure portal.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: The Azure portal is web-based and can be accessed from any device with a web browser, including an Android laptop. You can create VMs through the portal.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

You have an Azure environment.

You need to create a new Azure virtual machine from an Android laptop.

Solution: You use the PowerApps portal.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: PowerApps is used for building business applications with little or no code. It is not used to create Azure virtual machines.

text:
Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario.

You have an Azure environment.

You need to create a new Azure virtual machine from an Android laptop.

Solution: You use Bash in Azure Cloud Shell.

Does this meet the goal?
explanation: Azure Cloud Shell is browser-based and can be accessed from any device with a web browser, including Android. You can use Azure CLI in Bash to create VMs.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

Azure policies provide a common platform for deploying objects to a cloud infrastructure and for implementing consistency across the Azure environment.

Instructions: Review the undefined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed.' If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: Azure Resource Manager provides the deployment and management layer that enables you to create, update, and delete resources. Azure policies enforce rules and compliance, not deployment.

text:
You need to manage Azure by using Azure Cloud Shell.

Which Azure portal icon should you select? To answer, select the appropriate icon in the answer area.

statements.text: Select the '>_' icon in the Azure portal to open Cloud Shell

explanation: The Cloud Shell icon in the Azure portal looks like a command prompt symbol (>_) and is located in the top navigation bar.

text:
A team of developers at your company plans to deploy, and then remove, 50 customized virtual machines each week. Thirty of the virtual machines run Windows Server 2016 and 20 of the virtual machines run Ubuntu Linux.

You need to recommend which Azure service will minimize the administrative effort required to deploy and remove the virtual machines.

What should you recommend?
explanation: Azure DevTest Labs allows quick provisioning of Windows and Linux environments using reusable templates and artifacts. It's designed for dev/test scenarios where VMs are frequently created and removed.

text:
You have an Azure environment that contains 10 web apps.

To which URL should you connect to manage all the Azure resources? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Connect to https://portal.azure.com to manage all Azure resources

explanation: The Azure portal at https://portal.azure.com is the web-based unified console for managing all Azure resources.

text:
You plan to create an Azure virtual machine.

You need to identify which storage service must be used to store the data disks of the virtual machine.

What should you identify? To answer, select the appropriate service in the answer area.

statements.text: Azure Blob Storage (Page Blobs) stores virtual machine data disks

explanation: Azure virtual machine disks are stored as page blobs in Azure Storage. Page blobs are optimized for random read/write operations, which is ideal for VM disks.

text:
You plan to store 20 TB of data in Azure. The data will be accessed infrequently and visualized by using Microsoft Power BI.

You need to recommend a storage solution for the data.

Which two solutions should you recommend? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.
explanation: Azure SQL Data Warehouse (now Azure Synapse Analytics) and Azure Data Lake are designed for large-scale data analytics and integrate well with Power BI for visualization.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

When you need to delegate permissions to several Azure virtual machines simultaneously, you must deploy the Azure virtual machines to the same Azure region.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed.' If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: B
options.text: by using the same Azure Resource Manager template

explanation: To delegate permissions to multiple VMs simultaneously, you should deploy them to the same resource group. Permissions can be assigned at the resource group level and inherited by all resources within it.

text: Which cloud deployment is used for Azure virtual machines and Azure SQL database? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure virtual machines: Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Azure SQL Database: Platform as a Service (PaaS)

explanation: Azure Virtual Machines are IaaS - you manage the OS and applications. Azure SQL Database is PaaS - Microsoft manages the infrastructure and platform.

text:
You plan to migrate several servers from an on-premises network to Azure.

You need to identify the primary benefit of using a public cloud service for the servers.

What should you identify?

options.label: A
options.text: The public cloud is owned by the public, NOT a private corporation.

options.label: B
options.text: All public cloud resources can be freely accessed by every member of the public.

options.label: C
options.text: The public cloud is a crowd-sourcing solution that provides corporations with the ability to enhance the cloud.

options.label: D
options.text: The public cloud is a shared entity whereby multiple corporations each use a portion of the resources in the cloud.

explanation: The primary characteristic of public cloud is that it's a shared infrastructure where multiple organizations use portions of the same physical resources, achieving economies of scale.

text: What should you use to evaluate whether your company's Azure environment meets regulatory requirements?

options.label: A
options.text: Compliance Manager from the Security Trust Portal

options.label: B
options.text: the Advisor blade from the Azure portal

options.label: D
options.text: the Security Center blade from the Azure portal

explanation: Azure Security Center (now Microsoft Defender for Cloud) includes a regulatory compliance dashboard that provides insights into your compliance posture for supported standards like Azure CIS, PCI DSS, ISO 27001, and SOC TSP.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

Authorization is the process of verifying a user's credentials.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed.' If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.
explanation: Authentication is the process of verifying a user's credentials (proving identity). Authorization is determining what an authenticated user is allowed to do (permissions).

text:
Your company plans to automate the deployment of servers to Azure.

Your manager is concerned that you may expose administrative credentials during the deployment.

You need to recommend an Azure solution that encrypts the administrative credentials during the deployment.

What should you include in the recommendation?
explanation: Azure Key Vault is used to securely store and tightly control access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets. It can encrypt credentials used in automated deployments.

text: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
note: Each correct selection is worth one point.

statements.text: Azure Advisor provides recommendations on how to improve the security of an Azure AD environment
Azure Advisor provides recommendations on how to reduce the cost of running Azure virtual machines
Azure Advisor provides recommendations on how to improve the performance of App Service

explanation: Azure Advisor provides recommendations for cost, performance, reliability, and operational excellence. Azure AD security recommendations come from Azure AD Identity Protection, not Advisor.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

You have an Azure virtual network named VNET1 in a resource group named RG1.

You assign an Azure policy specifying that virtual networks are not an allowed resource type in RG1. VNET1 is deleted automatically.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed'. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: B
options.text: is moved automatically to another resource group

explanation: Azure Policy doesn't delete existing resources. VNET1 will be marked as non-compliant but will continue to function normally. Policies prevent creation of new non-compliant resources but don't remove existing ones.

text: What can Azure Information Protection encrypt?
explanation: Azure Information Protection can encrypt documents and emails by applying labels. It uses Azure Rights Management (Azure RMS) to protect documents and emails independently of their location.

text:
This question requires that you evaluate the underlined text to determine if it is correct.

If a resource group named RG1 has a delete lock, only a member of the global administrators group can delete RG1.

Instructions: Review the underlined text. If it makes the statement correct, select 'No change is needed.' If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.label: B
options.text: the delete lock must be removed before an administrator can delete RG1

options.label: C
options.text: an Azure policy must be modified before an administrator can delete RG1

options.label: D
options.text: an Azure tag must be added before an administrator can delete RG1

explanation: A delete lock prevents deletion by anyone, including administrators. The lock must first be removed before the resource group can be deleted.
